name: NAIRI: Tower of Shirin
description: Nairi: Tower of Shirin is a Graphic Adventure sure to intrigue, endear, and challenge players of all ages. Take Nairi, a young upper class girl, on an adventure that will change her, and her world, forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Display resolution of 1280 x 720 or higher
